column7: Course in Inequality & Cultural Understanding provides an interdisciplinary introduction to questions related to societal inequality. Each section emphasizes experiential learning through, for example, field trips or hands-on, community-based research projects. Prerequisite: This course is intended for first and second year students.
column9: Prerequisite: This course is intended for first and second year students.
column10: Social & Beh Sci - Beh Sci, and Cultural Studies - US Minority course.
